question: Two pipes can fill a cistern separately in 10 hours and 15 hours. They can together fill the cistern in
explanation:
Part of the cistern filled by both pipes in 1 hour = $latex \\frac{1}{10}+\\frac{1}{15} = \\frac{3+2}{30} = \\frac{1}{6}&s=1$
âˆ´ The cistern will be filled in 6 hours, hence option [C] is the right answer.
